glider_ingest.MissionData moduleÔÉÅ

class glider_ingest.MissionData.MissionData(memory_card_copy_loc: Path, working_dir: Path, mission_num: str, glider_id: str = None, nc_filename: str = None, output_nc_path: Path = None, mission_start_date: str | None = None, mission_end_date: str | None = None, mission_year: str = None, mission_title: str = None, glider_name: str = None, glider_ids: dict = {'1148': 'unit_1148', '199': 'Dora', '307': 'Reveille', '308': 'Howdy', '540': 'Stommel', '541': 'Sverdrup'}, wmo_ids: dict = {'1148': '4801915', '199': 'unknown', '307': '4801938', '308': '4801915', '540': '4801916', '541': '4801924'}, wmo_id: str = None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

A class representing glider mission data and metadata.

This class provides methods for managing and processing data related to a specific glider mission, including setup, file location retrieval, metadata extraction, and NetCDF file generation.

get_file_locs()ÔÉÅ

Defines and sets the file locations for flight card and science card data, including caches.

This method checks for case-insensitivity in file path locations to ensure proper retrieval of files, whether the case is uppercase or lowercase.

get_files(files_loc: Path, extension: str)ÔÉÅ

Retrieves files with a specific extension from the specified directory.

Parameters:

  • files_loc (Path) ‚Äì The directory where the files are located.

  • extension (str) ‚Äì The file extension to search for.

Returns:

A list of file paths matching the extension.

Return type:

list

Raises:

ValueError ‚Äì If no files are found or the directory does not exist.

get_mission_date_range()ÔÉÅ

Sets the mission start and end dates if not provided. Default start date is ‚Äò2010-01-01‚Äô and the end date is set to one year after the current date.

This method ensures that if the mission dates are not provided, reasonable defaults are applied.

get_mission_title()ÔÉÅ

Sets the mission title if not provided. Defaults to ‚ÄòMission {mission_num}‚Äô.

This method ensures that if the mission title is not specified, a default title is generated using the mission number.

get_mission_year_and_glider()ÔÉÅ

Extracts the mission year and glider details from a sample file.

This method identifies the year of the mission from the file name and validates the glider‚Äôs name or ID against a predefined list of possible values.

get_nc_filename()ÔÉÅ

Generates the NetCDF filename based on the mission number, year, and glider ID.

This method ensures that a valid filename is created if not provided.

get_output_nc_path()ÔÉÅ

Determines the output NetCDF file path based on the working directory and mission title.

This method ensures that the directory exists and the file path is set up correctly.

get_wmo_id()ÔÉÅ

Retrieves the WMO identifier for the glider based on its ID.

If the WMO ID is not provided, it looks up the value from the wmo_ids dictionary.

setup()ÔÉÅ

Initializes the mission data by setting up necessary attributes like mission date range, year, glider information, WMO ID, mission title, and NetCDF filename.

This method should be called after initialization to configure the mission object fully.
